title: Sample, ca. 1948
medium:
Medium: 
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft (brocade)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 25.5 x 85 cm (10 1/16 x 33 7/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Handwoven sample with off-white warp and off-white and metallic gold weft. The Hebrew letter shin is brocaded on the left in shades of yellow and the right in shades of grey with metallic silver. Woven sample for Park Synagogue, Cleveland Heights, Ohio.
